name: Shackle (Steven Miller)
description:
A ball and chain obstructs your movement, but do not let it weigh you down

Conquer over 45 levels and learn to use your restraint as your strength

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

Z / U / Shift / Backspace - Undo

R - Reset

Space / Enter - Continue

Escape - Exit

Tab - Toggle Fullscreen
